thread.title: Estranged South Korean director Kim Ki-duk looks to China
thread.title_full: Estranged South Korean director Kim Ki-duk looks to China

title: Estranged South Korean director Kim Ki-duk looks to China
text:
> Entertainment Estranged South Korean director Kim Ki-duk looks to China In this Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, photo, South Korean director Kim Ki-duk speaks during an interview at the Busan International Film Festival in Busan, South Korea. For the past two decades, South Korean maverick filmmaker Kim’s low-budget movies gave him international acclaims, much-coveted awards and many controversies. (AP Photo/Ahn Young-joon) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
